original_text: And when he had removed him, he raised up David to be their king, of whom he testified and said, ‘I have found in David the son of Jesse a man after my heart, who will do all my will.’
korean_text: 폐하시고 다윗을 왕으로 세우시고 증언하여 이르시되 내가 이새의 아들 다윗을 만나니 내 마음에 맞는 사람이라 내 뜻을 다 이루리라 하시더니

sentences.original_text: And when he had removed him,
he raised up David to be their king,
of whom he testified and said,
'I have found in David the son of Jesse
who will do all my will.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 내 모든 뜻을 행할 것이라.'
